snippet: Andrew Luck tossed four touchdowns as the Indianapolis Colts kicked off the National Football League post-season with a pulsating 45-44 comeback wild-card win over the Kansas City Chiefs on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Luck With Colts in Comeback Win Over Chiefs
headline.main: Luck With Colts in Comeback Win Over Chiefs

lead_paragraph: Andrew Luck tossed four touchdowns as the Indianapolis Colts kicked off the National Football League post-season with a pulsating 45-44 comeback wild-card win over the Kansas City Chiefs on Saturday.
